document.full_text: after being down by as many as 16 points, the knicks overcame a sluggish first half to win in scintillating fashion, keeping the knicks three and a half games ahead of eighth-place indiana.
document.title: knicks 120, nets 116: revamped knicks rally and outlast the retooled nets
lines_and_colors: after being down by as many as 16 points, the knicks overcame a sluggish first half to win in scintillating fashion, keeping the knicks three and a half games ahead of eighth-place indiana.
